text: Marinated pork cooked on a vertical spit, served with pineapple, onion, cilantro, and salsa on a warm corn tortilla. A true street food classic that captures the heart of Mexico City.
Crispy tortilla chips drenched in green salsa, topped with crema, cheese, and shredded chicken or eggs. A comforting breakfast favorite that blends crunch, spice, and soul.
Sweet corn tamales wrapped in husks and steamed to perfection. Soft, fragrant, and beloved during festivals and family gatherings.
